title: [Atoll, Ivory Path]
description: The outer ring of the atoll bends inward and upright to form a grotto, the natural stone encompassing its structure worn from repeated exposure to the elements surrounding it.  Ivory blocks edge the path leading around the grotto.

The outer ring of the atoll bends inward and upright to form a grotto.   The natural stone encompassing its structure worn from repeated exposure to the elements surrounding it.  Ivory blocks circle the outside of the path leading around the grotto.
